data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Occidental Mindoro, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Occidental Mindoro, Philippines

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Occidental Mindoro.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,203,225 lost in Occidental Mindoro that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Occidental Mindoro, Philippines.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Occidental Mindoro.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Occidental Mindoro.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Occidental Mindoro. Through your servants plant 511 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Occidental Mindoro
location.cities_list: San Jose, Sablayan, Mamburao, Calintaan, Caminauit
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Jose (118,807), Sablayan (38,383), Mamburao (23,892), Calintaan (11,476), Caminauit (11,161)
